title: The Story of the Prodigal Son: The Prodigal Son Returns to His Father's Home
provenance_text:
Pierre Mariette [1634 -1716], Paris [1]. The F. H. Bresler Co., Milwaukee, WI; acquired by Kenneth Seaver [1877-1969], Pittsburgh, PA and Oakmont, PA, on October 6, 1924 until January 24, 1949 [2]; his gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, January 1949.

Notes:
[1]. Lugt 1789, with the date 1667. 
[2]. Acquired at no charge; see original invoice in curatorial file.

creator.death_place: Frankfurt am Main (Darmstadt district, Hessen state, Germany)
